definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia
computer numerical control machine tool (CNC machine tool)

sentences.english: Compared with numerical control, its broad future in application is illustrated.
sentences.chinese: 并与数控机械加工比较，说明它适用的广泛前景。

sentences.english: In chapter 4, the experiment of temperature-thermal Errors of CNC machine tools is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 第四章，主要论述了数控机床热误差实验。

sentences.english: NC/CNC technology is the foundation of realizing automation of manufacturing process.
sentences.chinese: 数控技术是实现制造过程自动化的基础。

sentences.english: Digital control electronic governor can im- prove the idle speed characteristic of the high-speed direct injection diesel engine.
sentences.chinese: 数控电子调速器可改善高速直喷柴油机的怠速特性。

sentences.english: An important part of NC tools is to increase the cutting and feeding speeds.
sentences.chinese: 数控刀具是提高切削和进刀速度的重要环节。

sentences.english: The obvious regional also reflects the imbalance in the development of CNC machine tools.
sentences.chinese: 地域性的明显也反应了我国数控机床发展的不均衡。

sentences.english: The development method of last NC machine was researched.
sentences.chinese: 研究了数控刻楦机研制方法。

sentences.english: Introduce the application of tool detection in machining of NC carving miller.
sentences.chinese: 介绍数控雕铣床加工中对刀仪的应用。

sentences.english: CNC technology has become advanced manufacturing systems based on technology indispensable.
sentences.chinese: 数控技术已成为先进制造系统中不可缺少的基础技术。

sentences.english: A shortcut route has been provided for working out the post-process program of parallel-link machine tools.
sentences.chinese: 为编制虚拟轴机床数控后处理程序提供一条捷径。

sentences.english: It offer the reference for improving cutting quality of the numerical control plasma arc cuffing machine.
sentences.chinese: 为提高数控等离子切割机的切割质量提供参考。

sentences.english: When I go into the workshop, I will teach you how to operate an NC machine.
sentences.chinese: 当我走进车间时，我将要教会你们如何操作数控机床。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a processing mechanism, especially a NC drilling machine.
sentences.chinese: 一种涉及加工机械，特别是一种数控钻床。

sentences.english: In the numerical control lathe, now commonly used method for the sword to try to cut from gongben wuzang.
sentences.chinese: 在数控车床上，目前常用的对刀方法为试切对刀法。

sentences.english: The tool path mode and the feed mode in numerical control milling are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了三轴数控铣削加工的走刀方式和进刀方式。

sentences.english: For simulation the NC code verification, system uses the design model-based verification technique.
sentences.chinese: 数控代码的验证仿真采用基于设计模型的验证方法。

definition: computer numerical control machine tool (CNC machine tool)
